title: Cosmic Queries: The Sun and other Stars
description: The Sun is the star of the show as astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and comic co-host Chuck Nice answer fan questions in this solar edition of Cosmic Queries.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
